title: SNP Juniper MIST LAN/Wifi Bundles - Finalization and Get well
description:
Business Scope:
Our customers can react more flexible to the network market by minimizing process times and control on a single self service platform, thus reducing costs on the one hand and satisfying customers on the other. This solution is not yet available on the market and is therefore an innovation that promotes our image.

The new SD-WAN/WLAN product is a product which can be separately and independently booked from SD-WAN. But, it is expected to be mostly marketed together with SD-WAN as a SD-Branch Offer.

An extension of the product portfolio leads to long-term revenue assurance through a more cost-effective solution compared to the previous offering (complex, project-based). Economies of scale can be utilized through self-service and an automated platform chain (development, operating costs).

Fewer disruptions through AI (e.g. 96% fewer trouble tickets at T-Mobile US)
Improved end-user satisfaction
Lower operating costs through AI
Less effort and higher customer satisfaction through “real” SD-Branch approach
